general.copyright: Timely Perks Â© 2020 All Rights Reserved.
general.main-image-in-the-list: The first image is the default image
general.no-points-range: Should be a number between 1 and 100000
general.no-images-available-time: Select images and the available times

validations.not-in-range: See the range below for valid amount
validations.range-warning-combo: Warning !! The Benefit Discount is more than 50% of the min sum of selected products. This is just a warning and you can proceed at your own discretion.
validations.range-warning-bundle: Warning !! The Flat Price is less than 50% of the max sum of selected products. This is just a warning and you can proceed at your own discretion.
validations.range-deal-price: The range of total price of the deal could be
validations.range-description-limit: You could select any value between 1 and
validations.range-description-half-min: is 50 % of sum of minimum value of selected products
validations.range-description-half-max: is 50 % of sum of maximum value of selected products
validations.coupon-code-not-empty: It should not be empty since it is not available in public.

email.email: Please enter a valid email address

validations.no-password: Password must contain one speacial char, one digit, combination of upper and lower case, and atleast 8 chars.

password.min-length: Your password must have at least 8 characters

validations.num-greater-and-0: The number should be 0 or greater
validations.num-greater-and-1: The number should be 1 or greater
validations.num-between-1-100: The number should be between 1 and 100
validations.highlight-amount-max: The amount should be no greater than Minimum Order amount.

activate-account.title: Activation Page
activate-account.result-text: Successfully activated. You can close this page now and log in to your app
activate-account.notoken: Nothing is here to do, actually. You should use a proper link
activate-account.expired-token: The access is expired. Click the button below to get new activation email.
activate-account.resent-email: We sent the activation email once again. Please check your email again.
activate-account.fail: Something went wrong. Maybe you use this link second time?

punch-card.title: Loyalty Card
punch-card.description: Make new customers your regulars! Offer a free product after a select number of purchases.

points-perk.title: Points Perk
points-perk.description: Add value to your everyday purchase

deal-free-item.title: Get a Free Item
deal-free-item.description: Get a Free Item based on the cart amount. For example, free drink on any order $30+

deal-buy-one-get-one.title: Buy one, get one free
deal-buy-one-get-one.description: For example: Buy a main dish and get the second for free

deal-discount-items-p.title: % Discount on selected items
deal-discount-items-p.description: For example: 30% off on any dessert or drink

deal-discount-cart-f.title: Fixed discount amount on cart
deal-discount-cart-f.description: Fixed discount amount on the total cart value, usually combined with a condition like minimum ordering amount

deal-discount-cart-p.title: % Discount on cart
deal-discount-cart-p.description: % Discount on your total cart value, usually combined with a condition like minimum ordering amount

deal-multi-combo.title: Combo Deal
deal-multi-combo.description: Fixed discount amount on Combo Deal

promotions.combo-deal-description: Choose at least two item groups and determine the maximum number of items to make a combo deal.

combo-deal-description-example.title: Example: 'Buy a burger, side salad and 2 pops with $5 discount' would require following selections.
combo-deal-description-example.section1: - All burgers for 'Choose Required Items1' and 1 for 'Number of items'.
combo-deal-description-example.section2: - All salads for 'Choose Required Items2' and 1 for 'Number of items'.
combo-deal-description-example.section3: - All pops for 'Choose Required Items3' and 2 for 'Number of items'.

promotions.bundle-deal-description: Choose at least two item groups and determine the maximum number of items to make a bundle deal.

bundle-deal-description-example.title: Example: 'Buy a burger, side salad and 2 pops with $15' would require following selections.
bundle-deal-description-example.section1: - All burgers for 'Choose Required Items1' and 1 for 'Number of items'.
bundle-deal-description-example.section2: - All salads for 'Choose Required Items2' and 1 for 'Number of items'.
bundle-deal-description-example.section3: - All pops for 'Choose Required Items3' and 2 for 'Number of items'.

promotions.perk-title-first: Name your perk and make it yours
promotions.hide-perk-description: When this option is On, only clients that inserted a coupon code can use this perk
promotions.choose-num-punches: Number of purchases needed for the reward:
promotions.choose-num-punches-placeholder: Note: This is generally a number between 3 - 12
promotions.choose-gap-between: Do you like a gap between punches?
promotions.choose-points-giveaway: Do you want to give away store points for this item?

choose-items-description.point-perk: All items that you choose will get same points
choose-items-description.punch-card: Purchases of eligible items will count towards this reward.
choose-items-description.reward-item: All items that you choose will need same points
choose-items-description.deal-discount-item-free: In case you select more than one item, your client can choose only one
choose-items-description.deal-discount-item-p: Select one or more items. When clients add an item from your selection to the cart, the discount set below will be applied
choose-items-description.deal-buy-one-get-one: Example: Buy 1 Pizza and get the 2nd Pizza free would require to select all Pizzas for 'Required Items' and the same for 'Reward Items'. By default this template is set to discount the cheaper item by 100%.

promotions.set-benefit-cart-description: The discount amount will be deducted from the order cart sub-total value and it will be explicitly shown in the cart calculation.
promotions.set-coupon-code-title: Set a coupon code for this Perk
promotions.set-coupon-code-description: Coupon codes are used most successful when printed on flyers.
promotions.minimum-order-description: When you give discounted (free) item we suggest to add a minimum cart value in order to stimulate an increase in the order value
promotions.highlight-description: Some clients may not notice the promo deal section when they start ordering or they see it and decide to look into this later. If the value is 0, it wouldn't be highlighted.

highlight-custom-selection.title: Custom Selection
highlight-custom-selection.required: Client adds an item to the cart that matches any item from 'Required Items'
highlight-custom-selection.reward: Client adds an item to the cart that matches any item from 'Reward Items'
highlight-custom-selection.required-reward: Client adds an item to the cart that matches any item either from 'Required Items' or 'Reward Items'
highlight-custom-selection.description: Some clients may not notice the Perks deal section when they start ordering or they see it and decide to look into this later.
highlight-custom-selection.buy-one-get-one-children: Client adds an item to the cart that matches any item from Item

promotions.points-description: Make points something between 100 to 1000. Bear in mind that normally each 1000 points worth $1. So make something interesting and worthy.
promotions.limits-time-title: Do you want a time limit for your perk?
promotions.limits-time-description: Time limit is usually more than 2 months.
promotions.limits-once-title: Limit this perk once per client
promotions.limits-stock-description: Allow this promo deal to be used for the number of orders set above
promotions.date-time-limit-title: Limit day & time of the week
promotions.sel-client-title: Choose which clients can benefit from this perk
promotions.sel-exclusion-title: Set perks overlapping or exclusion rules

sel-exclusion-tooltips.no: This means a client can also make use of other Perks on the same order
sel-exclusion-tooltips.yes: If you mark this as exclusive then no other Perks on the same item are possible
sel-exclusion-tooltips.master: If marked as master, this perk deal can be redeemed alongside other perks even though those are marked as 'Exclusive'

promotions.status-disabled-tooltip: It is not a valid Promotion. Check the details.

user-profile.avatar-placeholder: Click to add or change your avatar

address.title: Address
address.no-item-max-validation: Please use no more than 10 characters

store.name: What is your store name?
store.no-locations: Nothing so far. Please, set up your profile first

delivery-rule-1.description: The first rule when using a particular distance must incorporate a NO minimum amount for spending.
delivery-rule-1.sub-description: You must decide how much of a delivery fee to charge when delivering a purchase of negligible (or zero) customer expenditures for this distance.

delivery-rule-2.description: Using the same distance you can now create new rules by changing the minimum amount of spending, as well as the delivery price.
delivery-rule-2.sub-description: This is to express a decreased delivery price for customers who are spending a desirable amount, based on your preferences.

delivery-rule-note.title: Note:
delivery-rule-note.description: You will not be able to create two rules where the values of distance and minimum amount spent are the same.

business-profile.name: What should we call your business?
business-profile.description: Give us a short description about your business.
business-profile.location-question: Do you have more than one location?
business-profile.one-location: Yes we have more than one location
business-profile.more-then-one-location: Yes we do not have more location
business-profile.get-data-google-long: You can Give us access to your Google My Business Profile. We can get all your data and do not need to fill them. Just review the data after importing the data.
business-profile.image-file-btn: Add an image of your business
business-profile.already-set-it-up: To tune operation time for a store, please go to

setup-brand-identity.map-text-note: Drag marker to your store location. Current:

user.use-credentials: Please use your credentials to login.
user.not-member: If you do not have an account,
user.no-account: If you do not have an account, please register.
user.confirmation-description: Check your email for the confirmation link to get registered.
user.redirect-to-login: Click Here to go to the login page
user.forgot-password-description: Please enter your email and send reset password request.
user.reset-password-finished: Your password has been reset successfully. Please close the page.
user.reset-password-token-invalid: The reset password link is invalid
user.reset-password-token-expired: The reset password link is expired. Please request again.
user.reset-password-unknown: Something wrong with the reset password link. Please request again.
user.reset-password-confirmation: An email to reset your password has been sent to
user.resend-activation-email-confirmation: An email to activate your account has been sent to

account-active.title: The account is active.
account-active.description: You have already activated your account. Let's dive in!

account-inactive.title: The account is not active.
account-inactive.description-1: Your account is not activated yet!
account-inactive.description-2: Please check your inbox and spam folder.

place-holder.checkbox: Allow adding same choice multiple times

order.delivering-time: How long the delivery would take?

change-store.title: Change Store
change-store.description: While changing stores will not affect the opening time of the store, you might miss notifications of incoming orders.

reject-order.title: Reject Order!
reject-order.description: You are about to reject the order, please provide a reason.

notify.product-delete-fail: Can not delete: The product is being used in Promotion.
notify.one-group-required: At least one group is required
notify.one-store-required: At least one store is required

delivery-rule-add-fail.one-zero-rule: Must define one rule which Min Amount is zero for the distance.

menu.business-profile-details-title: Give us more information about your store

connect.title: Connect your account to Stripe
connect.fail-title: Unfortunately, there is an error connecting your account to stripe, please try again later if the error persists contact us.
connect.instruction: By clicking on the button below you can connect your Stripe account or you can make an account. Then, we are able to pay you automatically and your Timely account would be activated.

disconnect.title: Disconnect your Stripe account
disconnect.instruction: Click on the link below to disconnect your Stripe account

confirmation.title: Your Stripe account is connected and we will pay your payments. Please contact us if you need any support.

payment.stripe-not-setup-warning: The payout method is not set yet. Any of your store information wouldnât be visible to the clients.

dashboard.popular_time_detail: Your most popular time is around

information.title: Support Information
information.description: While we are working on your issue you can use the information on our website.

send-email.title: You can notify us of your issue here, and we will follow through by email.
send-email.message-success: We got your inquiry. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

pages.error-title: Oops, it looks like an error has occurred!

alert.delete-product-in-promotions:
The product is being used in the Promotions. Do you really want to delete?. If you delete the product, the Promotions would not work properly.
